# Statify Frontend

> Real-time status page system frontend built with Next.js

## What is this?
Statify frontend is the web interface for a multi-tenant status page system that allows:
- Dashboard for managing service health status
- Incident logging and management
- Real-time status updates via WebSocket
- Public status pages for end users

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- TailwindCSS
- shadcn/ui component library
- WebSocket for real-time updates

## Features
- Organization dashboard
- Service management
- Incident management with status tracking
- Real-time status updates
- Public status page
- Responsive design

## Project Structure
- `/src/app` - Next.js App Router pages
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/features` - Feature-specific components
- `/src/lib` - Utilities and API client
- `/src/types` - TypeScript definitions

## Development
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

## Repository
https://github.com/Priyans-hu/Statify_frontend

## Related
- Backend API: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/Statify_backend
